text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: Contains the localization(s) and morphology of the primary tumor, which (i.a.) determines the assignment of the TNM classification to the tumor. Please note that the id, url, name and title are shortend because of the 64 char constraint.

purpose.value: A derived profile from [zib-TNMTumor.PrimaryTumor.Abnormality.Location](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-TNMTumor.PrimaryTumor.Abnormality.Location) to provide a version better suited for implementation purposes. This profile augments the base profile with elements found in the various use cases that have adopted the zib.
